backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing authorization mixins, invite codes, user onboarding, profiles, vehicles, notifications, and admin-restricted actions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest containing app metadata, icons, theme colors, and language configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic caching, fetch handling, and cache cleanup for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing and authentication gate setup using TanStack Router and profile loading logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message and optionally allows eligible users to claim first admin access through a form.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Shows a detailed error screen when loading a user's profile fails, with retry options and troubleshooting hints.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Presents the Internet Identity login screen with app branding and security feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Renders the application logo at variable sizes for branding use across the UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with header and footer layout logic, showing navigation only for authenticated and onboarded users.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Provides a dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, submitting a required description to the backend.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for reporting a lost vehicle as found, collecting a required finder report and submitting it.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Renders the main navigation header with dynamic menu items, user dropdown, admin links, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Component to initiate a vehicle ownership transfer, prompting for a PIN and generating a shareable transfer code link.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: Modal dialog that collects a user's PIN and handles submission errors and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Hooks for admin-related actions such as checking admin status, onboarding the first admin, managing invite codes, and retrieving system stats or registered vehicles.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Hooks to fetch lost vehicles and mutate their lost/found state while invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hooks for retrieving user notifications with polling and marking them as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Hook to complete user onboarding and refresh the profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Hooks for setting up or updating a user's PIN via backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks for getting the caller's profile based on role detection and a placeholder, plus a stub for unsupported profile saving.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Hooks to initiate or accept vehicle ownership transfers while refreshing impacted queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch a user's vehicles, fetch a specific vehicle, and register a new vehicle with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page describing the app, features, and admin contact info.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Handles accepting a vehicle transfer via a transfer code with validation and mutation logic.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays admin system stats, handles admin validation, and provides navigation to admin management pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Allows admins to view, generate, and manage invite tokens with copy-to-clipboard and usage tracking.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user statistics, quick actions, and system info using various data-fetching hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of reported lost vehicles with filtering and detail cards.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications and allows marking individual notifications as read.
A form page for completing onboarding using an invite token and basic profile details, then submitting to the backend and navigating home on success.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the logged-in user's profile and Internet Identity info, with read-only onboarding data and a logout action.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides a vehicle registration form including photo upload with progress tracking and submits data to create a new vehicle entry.
Allows users to create or update a PIN for securing vehicle ownership transfers, with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific vehicle, including photo, status badges, ownership checks, and transfer/lost actions.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Renders the user's vehicles list with status badges, loading states, and navigation to registration or vehicle details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integration for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, requirements, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features for the Pasar Digital Community app. Used as a central specification snapshot for build planning and debugging.
